title: Escape from Dearman (Shannon Randall, Joseph Turner, Robert Brown, Chelsea Reed, Justin Reed)
description:
The events depicted in horror movies are meant to live only on screen. In this case, the horrors that occurred in one Alabama house were all too real.

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
